name: Dark4chan Mobile
description:
Dark Style for the mobile version of 4chan.org

All you need :


  • A android phone

  • Firefox : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.mozilla.firefox

  • Stylish : https://addons.mozilla.org/android/addon/stylish/


    • For more informations : https://userstyles.org/help/stylish_firefox
